mapper.select: SELECT IFNULL(SUM(TA1.PRICE * TA1.CNT), 0) from (SELECT T1.PRICE, T1.CNT FROM tb_order T1 /*테이블_주문*/ WHERE T1.USER_SEQ = 1 AND T1.ORDER_STATUS_CODE IN ('03') UNION ALL SELECT T2.PRICE, T2.CNT FROM tb_new_order T2 /*테이블_신규상품주문*/ WHERE T2.USER_SEQ = 1 AND T2.ORDER_STATUS_CODE IN ('03') ) TA1
